components.name: Avro Source
components.description: Listens on Avro port and receives events from external Avro client streams. When paired with the built-in Avro Sink on another (previous hop) Flume agent, it can create tiered collection topologies.

bind.name: Bind address
bind.description: hostname or IP address to listen on

threads.name: Threads
threads.description: Maximum number of worker threads to spawn

compression-type.name: Compression-type
compression-type.description: This can be “none” or “deflate”. The compression-type must match the compression-type of matching AvroSource

ssl.name: Ssl
ssl.description: Set this to true to enable SSL encryption. You must also specify a “keystore” and a “keystore-password”.

keystore.name: Keystore
keystore.description: This is the path to a Java keystore file. Required for SSL.

keystore-password.name: Keystore password
keystore-password.description: The password for the Java keystore. Required for SSL.

keystore-type.name: Keystore type
keystore-type.description: The type of the Java keystore. This can be “JKS” or “PKCS12”.

exclude-protocols.name: Exclude protocols
exclude-protocols.description: Space-separated list of SSL/TLS protocols to exclude. SSLv3 will always be excluded in addition to the protocols specified.

ipFilter.name: Ip Filter
ipFilter.description: Set this to true to enable ipFiltering for netty

ipFilter.rules.name: Ip Filter Rules
ipFilter.rules.description: Define N netty ipFilter pattern rules with this config.
